Description:
Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported a user has deleted a unusual a large volume of files.

Author: austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Microsoft 365 - Unusual Volume of File Deletion
Query: sourcetype="m365-threat_management" eventsource="SecurityComplianceCenter" eventname="Unusual volume of file deletion" status="success"
